description: Troy Sparks"The Tank"Ht: 5'10" WT: 170lbs Season W/L record ( 1-0)Hayden Richards"The Swank"Ht: 6'0" WT: 180lbsSeason W/L record (2-0) Muscled newcomer Troy "The Tank" Sparks is back after defeating NK veteran Sebastian "The Tiger" Keys for his first match. His opponent this time is the undefeated Hayden "The Swank" Richards. With a record of 2-0, Hayden plans on continuing his domination by shoving his cock down The Tank's throat to let him taste what a real winner tastes like, before he rams it up his ass in the sex round. With a background in wrestling and MMA, the muscled newcomer is more than confident he's going to own the Swank's ass and turn it red by the end of the day. Both fighters are pulling out all the stops but only one man can stand victorious. Who will keep their undefeated record, and who's ass is getting plowed?
title: Hayden "The Swank" Richards vs Troy "The Tank" Sparks
